About.description: I am a dedicated developer who enjoys taking on challenges and expanding skills across diverse projects. My curiosity helps me adapt quickly to new trends and optimize my work. I strive to build performant, scalable solutions tailored to users.

items.title: Master's Student
bullets: Deepening advanced software architectures and distributed systems.
Academic projects focused on performance and scalable application design.

items.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science
bullets: Earned a Bachelor's in Computer Science in the "Software Engineering and Databases" track.
Built strong foundations in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering.

items.title: Web Developer Intern
items.company: Société du Port à gestion Autonome de Toamasina (SPAT)
bullets: Built a leave management platform covering requests, approvals, and tracking with Next.js, NestJS, and MySQL.
Modeled a relational database (employees, requests, approvals,...).
Implemented REST APIs with RBAC- and JWT-based authentication.

items.title: Web Developer Intern
items.company: Société de Manutention de Marchandises Conventionnelles (SMMC)
bullets: Designed and developed a visitor check-in/out tracking web app with HTML, CSS, and JSP.
Delivered an admin dashboard to visualize and manage visitor flows, reducing entry errors.

Expertises.sectionDesc: I build complete digital solutions, from design to production, combining design, performance, and scalability.

Contact.sectionDesc: Have a project in mind or just want to talk? Send me a message and let's see how we can work together.

flotmax.summary: Educational platform to solve, simulate, and visualize maximum-flow problems with a fast and focused interface.
flotmax.challenge: Students struggled to understand algorithm steps and manually validate their final maximum-flow results.
challengePoints: Hard to compare multiple solving strategies.
flotmax.solution: We built an interactive interface to draw graphs, run computations, and inspect each algorithm iteration.
flotmax.solutionHighlight: The platform improved algorithm understanding and reduced completion time for complex exercises.

features.title: Step-by-step simulation
features.desc: Detailed iteration rendering to inspect each capacity update.

features.title: Graph editor
features.desc: Fast node and edge editing with constraint-aware controls.

features.title: Result export
features.desc: Exportable summaries for revision and presentation.

features.title: Auto validation
features.desc: Automatic answer checks with model inconsistency detection.

moodspace.summary: Mood tracking app with time-based visual analytics to help users better understand emotional patterns.
moodspace.challenge: Users lacked simple tools to log mood consistently and extract practical insights from their data.
moodspace.solution: We designed a lightweight journaling flow with reminders, weekly charts, and contextual suggestions.
moodspace.solutionHighlight: Weekly engagement improved significantly thanks to simpler UX and immediate value feedback.

features.title: Daily tracking
features.desc: Mood logging in a few seconds with minimal friction.

features.title: Trend charts
features.desc: Clear evolution views for 7, 30, and 90-day windows.

features.title: Reflective notes
features.desc: Optional context notes to enrich emotional understanding.

features.title: Smart reminders
features.desc: Personalized prompts based on behavior and usage cadence.

portfolio-2.summary: Second portfolio version focused on performance, modularity, and clearer storytelling for project showcases.
portfolio-2.challenge: The previous site had limited scalability for detailed case studies and iterative content updates.
portfolio-2.solution: Complete rebuild with Next.js App Router, reusable components, and a cleaner information architecture.
portfolio-2.solutionHighlight: The new version supports faster iteration and makes technical achievements easier to communicate.

features.title: Consistent design system
features.desc: Unified component language for visual and UX consistency.

features.title: Built-in i18n
features.desc: Bilingual content management through locale-based messages.

features.title: Project case pages
features.desc: Dedicated pages to present challenge, solution, and impact.

portfolio.summary: First portfolio release used to shape my public positioning and publish my initial project selection.
portfolio.challenge: Ship a professional online presence quickly while keeping a clean and modern visual identity.
portfolio.solution: Delivered a first version centered on clarity with essential sections and a modern frontend stack.
portfolio.solutionHighlight: That baseline generated strong feedback and prepared the migration path to Portfolio V2.

features.title: Clear landing
features.desc: Direct presentation of profile, skills, and contact info.

features.title: Essential sections
features.desc: Experience, projects, and contact available in one flow.

features.title: Modern theme
features.desc: Cohesive palette and typography for a professional tone.

features.title: Reusable base
features.desc: Technical foundation later reused for V2.
